unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Describe the Distribution
question_text:
Here is a probability distribution for a random variable, $x$, describing the grades a professor has given out over the years. There are no plus or minus grades. Here, an $A=5$, a $B=4$, etc.
Which of the following most closely describes the distribution?
tables:

$p(x)$$0.02$$0.08$$0.10$$0.55$$0.25$
